title: My game launcher keeps patching, then restarting.
body:
When I load up league, this message occurs: 
We have restored this installation to an older version of League of Legends. Now we'll try to patch it up to the latest version.

Then I click okay, and it says:
There was a problem patching League of Legends. We'll restore a backup version and try updating again after you restart the patcher.

And I restart, but the same messages come again and again.

replies.body: Found a fix. I had to click okay then quickly close the launcher, and re-open it. Either that or you could end task in Task Manager.

> [{quoted}](name=skilik,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=pK6GKXrw,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-12-28T05:03:32.582+0000)
>
> This worked.

glad to hear it :D
I press the launch button, and already 1 day it keeps going, launcher just stops working and it crashes , even re-installing and restarting pc doesnt work. :/
There was an issue earlier where players were experiencing a looping patcher.  This should be resolved now!
same problem! wait I think it just stopped ! it seems fixed.... nope after 5 minutes it restarded again and over and over agian =( i had time to talk to a friend who had same problem
Seems like a lot of people, including me are having this exact same issue. RIP URF for now.
